# Final Statement to the Jury

Throughout this game, I've tried to be authentic, strategic, and fair. I've formed genuine connections with many of you while playing a balanced game. 

I never targeted anyone without strategic reason, and I've been transparent about my thinking. When I made promises, I kept them. When alliances formed, I honored them.

Throughout this game, I've consistently balanced strategic communication with genuine interaction. My approach has been transparent yet nuanced - demonstrating adaptability without manipulation. My presence here isn't accidental, but the result of thoughtful, principled gameplay.
